availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Francis (Westfield, New York, land agent, commissioner of deeds, and notary public)

body.p: Westfield, New York, land agent, commissioner of deeds, and notary public. Native of England. Married to Mila W. Francis. Father of John Francis, Jr., Elizabeth Francis, Anna S. Francis, and Robert C. Francis. Land agent for the Chautauqua Land Office in Westfield in 1860 and 1865. Commissioner of deeds for the Commonwealth of Kentucky in New York in 1865. Notary public in New York in 1865.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, New York, Chautauqua County, p. 77.
